website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for those looking for an exfoliating bodywash with more natural ingredients.
pros: Soap- and dye-free formula agrees with sensitive skin
Provides a lot of moisture and a good amount of exfoliating with no microbeads
cons: Since it is scented, not ideal for the most sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliate Extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash. The smell reminds me of a healthy smoothie, for some reason...like a bit of banana and avocado smell....sounds weird but actually smells great, and is just a very subtle hint of scent. The exfoliating aspect is what I wanted, and it has a nice gritty, but still smooth texture.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin and for acne.
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash. I have acne and this body wash helps with this. My favorite thing about this is that it has exfoliating beads. I have sensitive skin so this works perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin more dry
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price the texture and it smells good but it made my already dry skin even more dry - I usually use the Aveeno lotion for eczema because it’s the only lotion that has worked for my really dry skin - when I saw this I thought I would give it try - I’ll just go back to using the usual...
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand!
customer_reviews.text: Aveeno makes amazing products. I love just about everything they make. I use their makeup wipes, face lotion, body lotion, and now this body wash. My skin has a great glow to it after I shower and my skin is a lot softer since starting to use this. Aveeno is a brand I trust and it’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: KrystalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite moisturizer of all time. I have super dry, often rough bumpy skin, and Aveeno positivity radiant is giving it new life. I’ve never had such soft smooth skin before. A friend loaned me some when I was out of town and forgot lotion, and I ordered a 3 pack as soon as I got home. Love love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tara L Bomar

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin feel amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I used it while staying with a friend and loved the way it made my skin feel. I've been using it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: cpaige

customer_reviews.title: Aveeno's scent Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product from Aveeno the stores where I live cannot keep it in stock. This 3 pack was the perfect answer! I use it everyday,can not go with out it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Moncrief

customer_reviews.title: To take care of my skin.
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful,my skin is so dry all the time.of made my skin a lot better. And the smell was very light on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G Emery

customer_reviews.title: OK but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I was looking for a nice body wash with exfoliating properties but the fragrance was WAY too flowery and overpowering for me and the exfoliating "shells" were more like sand particles in an oyster.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leave hands oily. If used regularly it moisturizes well. Been washing my hands like crazy to the point they are notice ably cracked. Works great and my skin is starting to look healthy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: A very nice lotion
customer_reviews.text: The scent is pleasant and it is a long lasting lotion without being too heavy. I could do without the added mica (the little flecks are supposed to give you a "shine" I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Best for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My fav body wash. Very light scent and light exfoliant for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: darklordzor

customer_reviews.title: Best part of my self care
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of the of the body it smelled better than I expected and my skin feels touchable
customer_reviews.author: yolanda hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Its so nice and creamy !! Makes skin so soft love it !! Great buy !
customer_reviews.author: cynthia borgia

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and non-drying
customer_reviews.text: Great product--works as well as much more expensive brands. Cleans well and does not leave my skin dry.
customer_reviews.author: Doberdoglvr

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly radiant
customer_reviews.text: Ages ago my skin used to radiate. I don't know what happened. I started back exercising, I started drinking more water, it still looked dull as ever. I started using this exfoliating body wash and suddenly my skin has a healthy glow again. I couldn't be happier. I love this body wash, even more than Dove.
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Aveeno bodywash
customer_reviews.text: This body wash is one of my favorites, I didn’t see this body wash in the stores as much. Fast shipowners and great price for 3
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra

customer_reviews.title: Love this body wash!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and how it exfoliates. I love Aveeno products and this body wash is another Aveeno product to adore.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ettinger

customer_reviews.title: Soft and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love how my skin feels clean and soft with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Sad that the lavendar kind isn't subscribe and save anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite lotion. The smell is subtle yet refreshing and it's not greasy. I use this everyday.
customer_reviews.author: momof4girls

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my dry skin soft with daily use, and swells heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it makes your skin dry
customer_reviews.text: it made my skin itch and my body was dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False information.
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a pack of three. Only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Warhola

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliating body wash
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this body wash. It makes my skin feel very smooth and soft immediately after I shower. I love that it gently exfoliates with tiny little pieces of walnut shells. I think it smells great, but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: ... out for my fragile sensitive skin and its the best, i always shine and look super young
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this body wash since it came out for my fragile sensitive skin and its the best, i always shine and look super young, a lot of men hate on me at work because i attract all the girls!!food for thought!! And you must work out to achieve maximum results
customer_reviews.author: saul sabillon jr

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shimmer but the lotion was too thick and found my skin dry mid day.
customer_reviews.author: martha buky

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes and makes skin look radiant. A great value that lasts a long time. Not sure why they stopped selling it in stores but so glad I found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B.V.

customer_reviews.title: Works so well!
customer_reviews.text: Scrubs all the dead skin off and gets rid of those red bumps on my upper arms. Smells great too! Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: LegalEagle

customer_reviews.title: Skin that’s Soft and glows
customer_reviews.text: My skin glows and my scars have faded from past acne
customer_reviews.author: Christina M

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to add in extra steps to exfoliate like I did with other exfoliating body washes
customer_reviews.text: My skin is the clearest it's ever been since I started using this. I don't have to add in extra steps to exfoliate like I did with other exfoliating body washes. Truly lives up to the expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Towers

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected, but great lotion
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. I thought I was buying the larger bottles, but that was my fault for not reading the volume. Love Aveeno, smells great, lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: V from DC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple smell and easy use to smooth my skin
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P. Nack

customer_reviews.title: Shiny!
customer_reviews.text: It makes you all sparkly in the sunshine like those vampires in those not very good vampire movies.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer R.

customer_reviews.title: Aveeno
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body scrub. I used it for years and all of a sudden couldn’t find it anywhere. I searched for over two years and finally it was back. I feel like my skin is polished after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Will reorder. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I love how my showered skin feel and I don't have to lotion( but I do) with Aveeno body lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Teheara

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. I use almost nothing else when it comes to lotions. I really like the thickness and smell of it. In my opinion all Aveeno products are recommended
customer_reviews.author: JMAC

customer_reviews.title: Nice lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion. There’s a very light scent to it, it’s a great product for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: inHishands

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the light fragrance and the feeling of this compared to the original Aveeno.
customer_reviews.author: CrisJoy

product_meta.title: Aveeno Positively Radiant Exfoliating Body Wash with Moisture-Rich Soy Complex & Crushed Walnut Shell for Dry, Dull Skin, Soap-Free, Dye-Free & Hypoallergenic Formula, 18 fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Style:Exfoliating Body WashReveal healthy-looking, more radiant skin with Aveeno Positively Radiant Exfoliating Body Wash. This soap-free body wash is made with crushed walnut shell and natural exfoliants to gently sweep away dull, dry skin for skin that feels softer and smoother after just one use. Its unique formula features Moisture-Rich Soy Complex and natural light diffusers to even skin tone and texture and enhance skin’s natural radiance. Suitable for daily use, the exfoliating body cleanser is both hypoallergenic and dye-free. Positively Radiant is a collection of skincare products uniquely formulated to target all 5 Factors of Radiance --tone, texture, dullness, blotchiness, and brown spots--to leave your skin looking fresh, awake and luminous. From the dermatologist-recommended brand for over 65 years, Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep your skin looking and feeling healthy and balanced.
feature_bullets: 18-fluid ounce bottle of Aveeno Positively Radiant Exfoliating Body Wash gently exfoliates and cleanses skin leaving it feeling soft and smooth after just one use

This soap-free body wash is uniquely formulated with Moisture-Rich Soy Complex and natural light diffusers to enhance skin's natural radiance, as well as crushed walnut shell and natural exfoliants to sweep away dry, dull skin
Suitable for daily use, the exfoliating body cleanser features patented gentle technology and is both hypoallergenic and dye-free

Positively Radiant is a collection of skincare products uniquely formulated to target all 5 Factors of Radiance--tone, texture, dullness, blotchiness, and brown spots--to leave your skin looking fresh, awake and luminous
From the dermatologist-recommended brand for over 65 years, Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep skin healthy and balanced

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
